errors.name: InvalidPrincipalAmount
errors.msg: This amount is not sufficient as a principal amount.

errors.name: InvalidInterestAmount
errors.msg: This amount is not sufficient as an interest amount.

errors.name: DealNotLive
errors.msg: This deal is not live yet.

errors.name: InvalidDealRepaymentType
errors.msg: Invalid deal repayment type.

errors.name: NotEnoughLiquidity
errors.msg: Not enough liquidity.

errors.name: PrincipalRepaid
errors.msg: Principal is already repaid.

errors.name: InterestRepaid
errors.msg: Interest is already repaid.

errors.name: UnauthorizedSigner
errors.msg: The Signer is not authorized to use this instruction.

errors.name: CredixPassInvalid
errors.msg: Credix pass is invalid for this request.

errors.name: CredixPassInactive
errors.msg: Credix pass is inactive at the moment.

errors.name: Overflow
errors.msg: Overflow occurred.

errors.name: Underflow
errors.msg: Underflow occurred.

errors.name: ZeroDivision
errors.msg: Tried to divide by zero.

errors.name: ZeroDenominator
errors.msg: Invalid Ratio: denominator can't be zero.

errors.name: InvalidPreciseNumber
errors.msg: Invalid u64 used as value for PreciseNumber.

errors.name: PreciseNumberCastFailed
errors.msg: Unable to cast PreciseNumber to u64

errors.name: NotEnoughLPTokens
errors.msg: Not enough LP tokens.

errors.name: NotEnoughBaseTokens
errors.msg: Not enough Base tokens.

errors.name: InterestBeforePrincipal
errors.msg: Repay interest before principal.

errors.name: MarketIsFrozen
errors.msg: This market is currently frozen. Please try again later.

errors.name: InvalidBorrowerTokenAccount
errors.msg: Invalid Borrower Token Account.

errors.name: InvalidBorrowerAccount
errors.msg: Invalid Borrower Account.

errors.name: DealAlreadyActive
errors.msg: Deal is already active.

errors.name: InvalidInvestorTokenAccount
errors.msg: Invalid Investor Token Account.

errors.name: InvalidTokenAccountMint
errors.msg: Invalid mint for Token Account.

errors.name: InvalidMintAccount
errors.msg: Invalid mint Account.

errors.name: InvalidTreasuryAccount
errors.msg: Invalid treasury Account for this market.

errors.name: WithdrawalsLocked
errors.msg: Not yet possible to withdraw funds.

errors.name: TotalTrancheSizeNotOne
errors.msg: Total tranche size should be one.

errors.name: TotalTrancheReturnsNotOne
errors.msg: Total tranche returns should be one.

errors.name: InvalidTrancheSizeOrReturns
errors.msg: A tranche with a size should have a value for its returns and vice versa.

errors.name: InvalidTrancheIndex
errors.msg: There is no tranche in the deal with the provided index.

errors.name: DealAlreadyOpen
errors.msg: Deal is already opened.

errors.name: DealNotOpen
errors.msg: This deal is not open for funding yet.

errors.name: TranchePassInactive
errors.msg: Tranche pass is inactive at the moment.

errors.name: InvalidInstructionDepositTranche
errors.msg: Deposit Tranche instruction doesn't exist for senior tranche(index=1).

errors.name: RepaymentPeriodsPrincipalValuesInvalid
errors.msg: Total sum of all the principal should be equal to the total principal of the deal.

errors.name: NotEnoughTokens
errors.msg: Not enough tokens

errors.name: DealNotOpenForActivation
errors.msg: A deal can only be activated once all tranches(except for the senior tranche at index 1) have been filled.

errors.name: DealNotInProgress
errors.msg: Deal not in progress

errors.name: DealNotOpenForFunding
errors.msg: Deal not open for funding

errors.name: InvalidDealTokenAccount
errors.msg: Invalid deal token account.

errors.name: DealNotOpenForBurningTranches
errors.msg: Deal not open for burning tranches

errors.name: InvalidSeniorTrancheInstruction
errors.msg: This instruction is invalid for senior tranche.

errors.name: RepaymentPeriodsMissing
errors.msg: Repayment periods not fully set

errors.name: LastRepaymentInvalid
errors.msg: Last repayment in the repayment schedule should have some value for principal or interest

errors.name: ScheduleWithZeroRepayments
errors.msg: Repayment schedule has zero entries

errors.name: DealTrancheWithdrawalClosed
errors.msg: Deal not open for tranche withdrawal

errors.name: DealNotPending
errors.msg: Deal is not pending

errors.name: RepaymentPeriodsAlreadySet
errors.msg: Repayment periods already set

errors.name: TotalPeriodsExceeded
errors.msg: Total periods exceeded

errors.name: InvalidRepaymentSchedule
errors.msg: Invalid repayment schedule

errors.name: WrongAmountTrancheConfigs
errors.msg: Wrong number of tranche configs: expected 10

errors.name: RemainderCalculationFailed
errors.msg: Could not calculate remainder

errors.name: SimplifyFractionFailed
errors.msg: Could not simplify fraction

errors.name: TrancheFunded
errors.msg: Tranche already funded

errors.name: TransferSafeguard
errors.msg: Transfer safeguard

errors.name: MaxManagersExceeded
errors.msg: Too many managers specified. Max: 10

errors.name: MaxPassIssuersExceeded
errors.msg: Too many pass issuers specified. Max: 5

errors.name: InvalidPassInstructionSigner
errors.msg: The signer does not have permission to issue passes.

errors.name: PeriodIndexOutOfBounds
errors.msg: The period index exceeds the length of periods.

errors.name: BaseDepositLimitExceeded
errors.msg: The max deposit amount limit reached. Please try again later.

errors.name: DaysInYearPeriodDurationRest
errors.msg: Days in year is not a multiple of period duration

errors.name: MintNotOwnedByCredix
errors.msg: The passed mint account is not initialized by credix program or does not have a freeze authority.

errors.name: PeriodDurationIsZero
errors.msg: Period duration is zero

errors.name: ModifyingRepaidPeriods
errors.msg: Can not modify partially repaid periods.

errors.name: DealPrincipalModified
errors.msg: Can not modify total principal expected in the repayment schedule.

errors.name: StructuringDealForbidden
errors.msg: Deal should pending or structuring to (re)set the repayment schedule
